metadata.title: CVE-2015-7012 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WebKit, as used in Apple iOS before 9.1, Safari before 9.0.1, and iTunesbefore 12.3.1, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a craftedweb site, a different vulnerability than other WebKit CVEs listed inAPPLE-SA-2015-10-21-1, APPLE-SA-2015-10-21-3, and APPLE-SA-2015-10-21-5.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
